title: What are some of the best slow old rock songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: The songs added below are absolute gold. I have created this list after spending countless hours on youtube. Listening to good music is one of my passions and this list goes on to show that. This list is not created in any specific order.Please Listen to each and every one of them . I will keep on adding more but these are the top one coming to my mind. John Denver - Annie's SongJohn Denver - Leaving On A Jet PlaneJohn Denver - Take Me Home, Country RoadsThe Beatles - While My Guitar Gently WeepsThe Beatles - A Day In The LifeNorwegian Wood - The BeatlesThe Beatles - YesterdayJohn Lennon - ImagineThe Sound of Silence (Original Version from 1964)Simon & Garfunkel - The Boxer (Audio)Credence Clearwater Revival: Have You Ever Seen The Rain?Black Sabbath SolitudeBlack Sabbath - Planet Caravan [HQ]The Doors - The End (original)Deep Purple-Child in TimePink Floyd - Wish You Were HereKansas - Dust in the Wind (Official Video)The Moody Blues - Nights In White SatinNeil Young - Heart Of GoldBoston- More than A FeelingBlack Sabbath- Vol. 4- Laguna Sunrise Black Sabbath - Fluff (Instrumental)Led Zeppelin - The Rain Song (2014 Remaster)Going to California - Led Zeppelin (with lyrics)Eric Clapton - Layla (acoustic)Eric Clapton - Tears in heavenEric Clapton - Wonderful Tonight (Official Live Video)

Any song by Crosby Stills Nash and/or Neil Young….. Helplessly Hoping Helpless Guinivere Harvest Harvest Moon Deja Vu Wooden Ships Suite Judy Blue Eyes Woodstock Ohio Wasted on the Way Just a Song Befote I Go………
